description.en:
Kurata Mugi is unlucky, even on her supposedly lucky day she manages to attract a lot of unfortunate situations. One of them is lending her umbrella to a perfect stranger and catching a cold herself. Turns out this stranger is a school mate of hers who tells her that there is no use in waiting around to get lucky - rather luck is something you actively take for yourself. Now, what will Mugi make of that? 

Trama: Mugi è una ragazza perseguitata dalla sfortuna. Hinata invece ha successo in tutto quello che fa... A cosa portera'  il loro improvviso incontro?!
